Detailed Description

Inet advertiser.

Protocol description:

  • id is always one octet long.
  • 0x02 header element, element length will follow.
  • 0x03 port element, element length is 2 octets.
  • 0x04 data element, element length will follow.
  • Length field is always 1 octet. One field can be only 255 octets long. [0x02][0x06][HEADER][0x03][0xffff][0x04][0x04][DATA]
